items.title: Illinois General Assembly Passes Energy Reform Act Aiming to Reduce Rates and Reach Clean Energy Goals

items.title: When the Power Grid Needs Relief from High Demand, Here’s Who You Call
items.description: When electricity supplies are tight, being able to flip a few switches and save 38 gigawatt-hours is a pretty cool trick. items.title: Another Dry Spell Hits New England, Raising Alarm About Flash Droughts
items.description: Eighty-two percent of New England is experiencing drought conditions, affecting everything from wildfire risk to the vibrancy of the region’s iconic fall foliage.
